ID: TYPE – This column determines the type of courier format. New, Menu, Item or Button
ID – This is the ID name of the command.
Sub List – This is a sub list of commands that appears after you click on the higher level item
Commands – This is the list of commands sent by courier to the AI controlled unit
Text – This is the text of the command sent by courier to a human controlled unit

column7: Note: Limit this List to what a subordinate can dettach within his command.  So if Sickles was sent this message, only his command will show.  Check as Needed...

Notes: This option will only appear for Computer subordinate.
This option will only appear for Computer subordinate.
